name: CvorSafetyRating
title: CVOR Safety Rating
description: Commercial Vehicle Operator Registration (CVOR) safety rating classifications used in Ontario.

concept.definition: The highest safety rating indicating superior compliance with commercial vehicle safety standards and regulations.
An acceptable safety rating indicating compliance with commercial vehicle safety standards based on a completed audit.
An acceptable safety rating assigned without a formal audit, typically for operators with limited road history or newly registered carriers.
A safety rating indicating that specific conditions or corrective actions must be met to maintain operating authority.
A safety rating indicating serious non-compliance with commercial vehicle safety standards, potentially leading to operating restrictions.
